import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const Main = () => { const navigate = useNavigate() const [searchValue, setSearchValue] = useState('') const handleSearch = () => { if (searchValue >= '01.03.01' && searchValue <= '06.03.02') { navigate('/About/МАТЕМАТИЧЕСКИЕ И ЕСТЕСТВЕННЫЕ НАУКИ') } else if (searchValue >= '07.03.01' && searchValue <= '29.03.05') { navigate('/About/ИНЖЕНЕРНОЕ ДЕЛО, ТЕХНОЛОГИИ И ТЕХНИЧЕСКИЕ НАУКИ') } } return (
